# Quantitative Biology (BIOL120) Excercise Guidebook {#intro}

Welcome to *Quantitative Biology*! This document here will be your **excercise guidebook**, or what some will call the **Laboratory notebook**. 

You will find here all the exercises for class, as well as a basic reference guide for basics of coding and all the resources we will use for the course
